The Hall of Records represents a D-4 conduit through which data from the Akashic Record and Ancient Dora-Teura can be downloaded through the Earth’s seven-primary vortices and into the Sphere of Amenti and Earth’s mor- phogenetic field. The data is transferred electronically through the Hall of Records, into Amenti and Earth’s core, then into Earth's grid. The history of the universe then becomes available to anyone on Earth that has a high enough accretion level to translate the data through their genetic cod e 206
